message: Hello Bob, I'm offering you a great product for a price of $14,000. I believe this product will be very valuable to you.
Hello Alice, thanks for the offer. I'm interested in the product but $14,000 is a bit too high for me. Would you consider $10,000?
Bob, I appreciate your interest.  While $10,000 is too low, I'm willing to come down a bit to $13,000. This is my final offer.
Hi Alice, I appreciate you working with me on the price. $13,000 is closer to what I had in mind, but still a little high. How about we meet in the middle at $11,500?
